description.value:
Once taken the user experiences powerful illusions of the past, present, and future. Rare and deemed illegal. Imposes -10 to Willpower and -20 to Perception Tests for 3d10 Minutes, however the consumer experiences visions and altered perceptions decided by GM. Afterwards make Willpower Test or suffer 1d5 Insanity, and a 20% chance to also gain 1d5 Corruption

Effect: Very Rare

Notes: 500 T
